title: The 6-8 shark that washed ashore  at Carolina Beach recently was identified as a sand-tiger shark, which are mostly disinterested in humans.  The article in the Star News also quoted the tow company that removed the sand-tiger as saying they had just removed a 14 foot shark from Fort Fisher.  What type of shark was that? Few sharks reach such size..
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7710
